headline: NFP Welcomes Tony Garcia, Senior Casualty Broker, to its Commercial Real Estate Practice
summary: NFP, an Aon company and leading property and casualty broker and benefits consultant, today announced the hire of Tony Garcia as senior vice president, casualty broker, in its Real Estate practice. Based in New York City, Garcia will report to Robert Terracciano, managing director, head of Real Estate, NFP.

headline: Why Jefferies favors P&C brokers over carriers into 2026, names top picks
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies sees property and casualty (P&C) insurance brokers as the safer positioning within insurance heading into 2026, arguing that the group should continue to outperform carriers even as pricing momentum moderates across commercial lines.
